safe.title: Car rental keeps you safe
safe.description: The safety of our employees and renters is our number one priority. In addition to being confident your vehicle is cleaned and sanitized every time you rent, you can also feel confident that we will take every opportunity to enhance the health and safety measures currently practiced in our operations.
card: Every car is thoroughly sanitized and cleaned
All of our employees wear masks
We stay up to date with all protocol from the CDC
